backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing channel management, user profiles, categories, access control, and storage mixins.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining color variables and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/account/AccountS: Displays user name and Bacon Cash balance with a button to buy more.
Restricts content to admins, showing loading or access denied when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/adult/AdultGateD: Modal dialog requiring age confirmation before viewing adult content.
frontend/src/components/adult/AdultRoute: Blocks protected content until adult-content consent is granted.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Generic access denied page with a return-home button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: First‑time user dialog to set a display name and create a profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Conditional render gate enforcing admin or channel‑owner permissions.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandLo: Clickable RockHog TV logo that navigates to the home page.
frontend/src/components/branding/Categor: Maps category names to icon image paths and renders the matching image with optional sizing classes.
frontend/src/components/branding/HeroBan: Displays a large hero banner with background image, title, and description overlay.
frontend/src/components/channels/Channel: Renders a clickable card for a channel with thumbnail, title, category badge, and description.
Provides a dialog form to create or edit a channel, handling validation, thumbnail upload, and mutations.
Shows a responsive grid of ChannelCard components with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/channels/Thumbna: Handles image file selection, upload progress, preview, and removal for channel thumbnails.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, navigation, authentication UI, and profile setup trigger.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Prima: Renders the primary category navigation and optional Creator Studio link based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/player/StreamEmb: Embeds a stream URL by auto-detecting provider or using raw embed code, with fallback for missing streams.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareButto: Provides a share button using Web Share API or clipboard fallback with toast notifications.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/ai.ts: Empty placeholder file for AI systems in the BaconOps engine.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/consta: Empty placeholder for BaconOps engine constants.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/gameLo: Empty placeholder for the BaconOps main game loop implementation.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/gameSt: Empty placeholder for BaconOps game state management.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/render: Empty placeholder for BaconOps rendering logic.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/system: Empty placeholder for BaconOps ECS or game systems.
Empty placeholder for shared BaconOps engine types.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/useDesk: Empty placeholder hook for desktop control input handling.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/useTouc: Empty placeholder hook for touch control input handling.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/Virtual: Empty placeholder for virtual touch/game controls UI.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/BaconOpsMa: Empty placeholder for the BaconOps main menu UI.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/Hud.tsx: Empty placeholder for the BaconOps HUD UI.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/RoundOverl: Empty placeholder for the BaconOps round transition overlay.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/StatsPanel: Empty placeholder for the BaconOps stats panel UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdultGate.ts: Provides a hook managing adult-gate consent using sessionStorage with helpers to grant or revoke consent.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Exposes hooks to fetch caller role and admin status via react-query and actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines Internet Identity context, provider, and hooks for authentication and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains react-query hooks for fetching and mutating channels, user profiles, and other backend resources.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBaconCashRequest: Admin page listing bacon cash requests with actions to fulfill them.
frontend/src/pages/BaconOpsArenaPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHomePage.tsx: Home browse page showing categories and recent channels using fetched channel data.
frontend/src/pages/BuyBaconCashPage.tsx: Provides a form for users to request Bacon Cash purchases and displays their past requests and current balance.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Loads channels for a given category and displays them, with adult categories gated behind an age check.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows a contact card with the owner's email and a mailto link for user inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorStudioPage.tsx: Allows authenticated creators to manage their channels, including creating, editing, deleting, and copying channel fields.
frontend/src/pages/StreamDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single stream's player and metadata with edit and delete options for owners or admins.
frontend/src/utils/category.ts: Defines category values, labels, and helpers for retrieving category metadata and display names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color system using CSS variables, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, versioning, and a list of implemented features for the RockHog TV platform, including categories, admin workflows, browsing pages, gating, currency, and authentication.
